ConfigItem.Name: Ticket::Frontend::AgentTicketZoomTabEditDynamicFields###Permission
ConfigItem.Description: Required permissions to use the ticket note screen in the agent interface.

ConfigItem.Name: Ticket::Frontend::AgentTicketZoomTabEditDynamicFields###DynamicField
ConfigItem.Description: Dynamic fields shown in the dynamic field tab of the agent interface. Possible settings: 0 = Disabled, 1 = Enabled, 2 = Enabled and required.

ConfigItem.Name: Ticket::Frontend::AgentTicketZoomTabEditDynamicFields###StateType
ConfigItem.Description: Defines the next state of a ticket after editing a dynamic field, in the ticket dynamic field tab screen of the agent interface.
